alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 9:04PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST FELICIANA, NORTHWESTERN ST. HELENA, NORTH CENTRAL POINTE COUPEE AND EAST FELICIANA PARISHES, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, WILKINSON AND AMITE COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CST... At 904 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Gloster to 7 miles northwest of St. Francisville. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Liberty, Magnolia, Summit, Centreville, Woodville, Gloster, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Smithdale, Spillman, Darlington, Felps, Gillsburg, Easleyville, and Crosby. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 9 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
